author: Staff Reporter
text:
The house of K. Narayanasamy (42) of Chandra Mani Nagar in Periyanaickenpalayam was burgled when there was nobody home on Thursday. The police said that around 13 sovereigns gold jewellery and Rs. 15,000 in cash was stolen from the house. Periyanaickenpalayam Police was investigating the case.

Man run over by bus

An unidentified man aged around 45 to 50 years died after he was run over by a government bus near Ukkadam on Friday night. The police said that the victim was a beggar and was sleeping on the platform near Ukkadam bus depot, when the bus running between Ukkadam and Mayilampatti that came in the reverse gear ran over him.

Two more complaints against Shruti

The Central Crime Branch of the city police received on Saturday complaints from two more men from Chennai against city based girl Shruti. The two men on Saturday claimed that she approached them for marriage and cheated them by not marrying them and parting with the several lakh rupees.
title: House burgled
